text: The women's marathon competition of the athletics event at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 7 June at the Kallang Practice Track in Singapore. ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing Asian and Games records were as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- |Asian record | |2:19:12 |Berlin, Germany |25 September 2005 |- |Games record | |2:34:29 |Chiang Mai, Thailand |13 December 1995 |} ==Schedule== All times are Singapore Standard Time (UTC+08:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Sunday, 7 June 2015 || 06:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%; position:relative;" width=70% |- |KEY: |align=center|GR||Games record |align=center|NR||National record |align=center|PB||Personal best |align=center|SB||Seasonal best |align=center|DNF||Did not finish |} : {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athletes !width=80|Time !width=50|Notes |- | || align=left| || 3:03:25 || |- | || align=left| || 3:04:39 || |- | || align=left| || 3:07:14 || |- | 4 || align=left| || 3:14:10 || |- | 5 || align=left| || 3:16:02 || |- | 6 || align=left| || 3:18:14 || |- | 7 || align=left| || 3:23:38 || PB |- | 8 || align=left| || 3:35:54 || |- | || align=left| || — || DNF |- | || align=left| || — || DNF |} ==References== ==External links== * Women's marathon Category:Women's sports competitions in Singapore Category:2015 in women's athletics Southeastasian 2015 Southeast Asian Games
title: Athletics at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Women's marathon
